attributes.action: Support Wedding Industry During the Covid-19 Crisis
attributes.additional_details: Wedding industry is hardest hit by covid-19 as Wedding season starts from april to september. Wedding Industry needs help to survive during  these difficult times.it is very frightening times for wedding industry we don’t know where to go.
attributes.background: The prospect of widespread cancellations of Weddings , Events  and Parties due to COVID-19 threatens to cause huge financial hardship for Britain's Wedding Industry. We ask Parliament to provide a package of emergency financial and practical support during this unpredictable time.
